title: Assassin's Creed Shadows Is Adding Some New Parkour Moves
description: Parkour has been an important part of the Assassin's Creed franchise from the beginning, but Assassin's Creed Shadows will be making some adjustments to the acrobatic running style. Ubisoft has already hinted that Naoe--one of Shadows' new leading characters--can Naruto run in the game. But that's just the beginning of what she can pull off while running.Ubisoft has shared an extensive breakdown of Shadow's new parkour options, as well as the revised button map for the game. One of the most notable changes is that the crouch and the dodge buttons have traded places. That will allow the player to either crouch or lie in a prone position. Naoe can even kill her targets while lying prone. Yasuke--the game's other lead character--and Naoe can both perform dodges while crouched, but only the latter can pull off a dodge in her prone stance. The other new parkour moves that Naoe can pull off include a wall-run eject and a backward dodge, which you can see below.Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Ys Memoire: The Oath In Felghana Refined Edition Now Available For PS5 And Nintendo Switch
description: Ys Memoire: The Oath in Felghana Refined Edition is now available for Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 5. Fans of Nihon- Falcom's classic RPG series can pick up a physical copy of The Oath in Felghana for $60 at Amazon, Walmart, or Best Buy. Like other physical releases of Ys games, the launch version of The Oath in Felghana is a cool collector's set bundled with extras. Ys Memoire: The Oath in Felghana Refined Edition $60 The Ys Memoire: The Oath in Felghana Refined Edition includes the base game, an acrylic keychain and diorama set, a compilation soundtrack, illustrated microfiber cloth, and a set of postcards. It's priced at $60, so this is a great opportunity for fans to get a cool physical release with collectibles for a great price. Like other Ys physical editions, quantities are limited.Base gameAcrylic keychainDiorama setFour postcardsSoundtrack on CDMicrofiber clothCheck out all of the extras in the image below. See at Amazon See at Best Buy See at Walmart Ys Memoire: The Oath in Felghana Refined EditionYs Memoire: The Oath of Felghana Refined Edition at AmazonPS5 -- $60Nintendo Switch -- $60There's an interesting history behind this Ys release, as it was first released under the title of Ys III: Wanderers from Ys in 1989. It was remade as Ys: The Oath in Felghana for PSP in 2005. The remake was ported to PC in 2012, and now it has been remastered for Nintendo Switch and PS5.Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: The US just added the world's biggest games publisher Tencent to their list of Chinese military companies
description: Chinese publisher Tencent are the biggest video game company in the world. Their wholly owned subsidiaries including League Of Legends developers Riot Games, Path Of Exile developers Grinding Gear Games, and UK outfit Sumo Group. They own shares in everything from Epic Games through Ubisoft to Silent Hill 2 rebooters Bloober Team. Are you a game developer? Odds are that at least one percent of your body belongs to Tencent. Maybe one of your toes. And now it turns out that Tencent are some kind of military operator, as well. Or at least, that's what the US Department of Defence would have us believe: they've just somewhat randomly added the firm to an infamous list of Chinese military companies, together with lithium-ion battery maker CATL. This potentially makes it difficult for Tencent to do business in the States, but Tencent say that it's all based on a "misunderstanding". Read more
author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell

title: Behold the Lenovo Legion Go S, the SteamOS handheld PC that isn’t a Steam Deck
description: There’s a new Lenovo Legion Go on the way, and while it’s ditching the signature detachable controllers, it’s still got something unusual to stick on its CV. The Lenovo Legion Go S is a smaller, cheaper take on Lenovo’s portable gaming PC, and it’s on track to become the first officially licensed SteamOS handheld outside of Valve’s own Steam Deck range. title: Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 863
description: So…what is the Monday Poll? Excellent question! It isn’t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007). 1. If you could eat one food all day long, what would it be? Popcorn! If left to my own devices, I could easily have it for breakfast, lunch and dinner. 2. Who in your life is most like you? To be honest, probably my dog, Marnie. 3. Your current favorite store? Ooh, girl. You know you’ve crossed a bridge when you no longer want to hang out at Sephora or Nordstrom anymore. LOL! These days I’m all about Williams Sonoma (the fancy kitchen store)! Who wants to come with me to gawk at gadgets, dutch ovens and tableware? 4. What’s one thing you need to do today? Vacuum, although honestly I don’t know why I keep trying to keep the floors clean. Between the pets, friends and[Continue reading...] The post Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 863 appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.
author: Karen

title: Sundays With Tabs the Cat, Makeup and Beauty Blog Mascot, Vol. 845
description: Tabs was world renowned for his ambitious new year’s resolutions, whether it was training for the Iron Cat Triathlon, studying for the MCCATs (Medical Cat College Admission Test) or committing to walk in all four of the year’s big feline fashion shows — the so-called Grand Slam of kitty supermeowdelry. But his goals weren’t always epic. Sometimes, they were something simple… My darlings, The new year is upon us, and, with that, many new year’s resolutions. I was talking to a few kitty friends of mine, and one resolution that always pops up is getting fit. Believe it or not, despite my statuesque frame, fitness is something I actually have to work hard to achieve. This body doesn’t come naturally. Well…most of it does, but I do have to put in the work, and I believe in putting in the work, especially in the pursuit of purr-fection. Because you’re my favorite fans, here are my top tips to get in tip-top shape in 2016. Walking works! Don’t believe the hype: it’s not always about high-impact[Continue reading...] The post Sundays With Tabs the Cat, Makeup and Beauty Blog Mascot, Vol. 845 appeared first on Makeup and Beauty Blog | Makeup Reviews, Swatches and How-To Makeup.
author: Karen

title: Halo Infinite head of design's NetEase studio "halting work" on first game as it searches for new publisher
description: Jar of Sparks, the Seattle-based "AAA" studio established by Halo Infinite head of design Jerry Hook back in 2022, has halted work its currently unannounced first title as it searches for a new publishing partner, and that's it's looking to "find all of our team new homes" as a result. Read more
author: Matt Wales

title: Sony shows off conceptual immersive gaming tech that lets you stand in a TV box and sniff The Last of Us
description: Curious to know what wild ideas Sony might be pondering for the future of gaming? Well, you're in luck: it's just unveiled new conceptual technology designed to ramp up immersion by sticking players inside a TV box and squirting smells into the room. So if you've ever wanted a whiff of Kratos after a hard day's slaying, your dreams are now one step closer to reality. Read more
author: Matt Wales
